> H. You are too confused to care but you ~do~ like that new catchy

I think I'd pick that option, as well as the accompanying "Ahou Odori"
(Moron's Dance).

> [Stuff]
> I don't understand the request on starting a forum on the 
> messageboard with introductions...do you mean introducing us 
> members?  Please explain just tell me what to do exactly.

Yeah, it might be a good idea to introduce ourselves. I sometimes see
that on Japanese message boards. If you guys want, I can even prepare
introductions in Japanese.
